title: Even if the amenity open space (LOS) is reduced to make the project viable a minimum of at least 10% of open space shall be maintained
clause_text: Even if the amenity open space (LOS) is reduced to make the project viable a minimum of at least 10% of open space shall be maintained. 9. 20% of the incentive FSI can be used for non-residential purposes otherwise permissible in the DCPR.
section: 33(6) Reconstruction of buildings destroyed by fire or which have collapsed or which have been demolished under lawful order
